meta_data.description: Buy Euhomy Top Loading Water Dispenser, Hot and Cold Water Cooler for 3 or 5 Gallon Bottles,Child Safety Lock,Water Cooler Dispenser for Kitchens, Offices and More - Black: Water Coolers - Amazon.com ✓ FREE DELIVERY possible on eligible purchases

feature_bullets: Top Loading Water Dispenser: The Euhomy top loading water dispenser fits 3 or 5 gallon water bottles. You can easily see if you have enough water without worrying about wasting unused water.
Hot and Cold Water: This hot and cold water dispenser allows you to choose cool ice water or hot water as needed, perfect for mixing iced drinks or making tea or hot chocolate.

Child Safety Lock: This water dispenser uses buttons to control the amount of water dispensed. The hot water button also has a child safety lock and a two-step water dispensing function, so you no longer have to worry about accidentally pouring hot water.
Water Collection Tray: There will be a removable and washable tray under the spout of the cooler, which can effectively prevent spilling and messing up when taking water.

Euhomy: Euhomy has always been committed to bringing convenience to your life and living your cool life. We provide excellent customer service and one year warranty, if you have any questions, please contact us.

specifications.Top Loading Water Dispenser: The Euhomy top loading water dispenser fits 3 or 5 gallon water bottles. You can easily see if you have enough water without worrying about wasting unused water.
